articles.description: Innersloth released the Airship map in Among Us. The map is the biggest yet and is chock-full of references to other games and franchises like Halo, Super Smash Bros., Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, and more.
articles.content: The newest map for the popular Mafia-style game, Among Us, launched March 31. Its the games biggest map yet, and as players have discovered, its allowed for the developers to hide plenty of secrets i… [+2638 chars]
